title: What is your thoughts about the Xbone?
body:
Do you think Microsoft is going to bail out and sell the brand? They have already considered it before it was even released, and now it's getting it's ass kicked and the only console seller exclusive (Halo: MCC) is literally the biggest pile of shit you will ever play.

Not to mention that is is going to quickly become bottle necked in any real "next gen titles" due to DDR3 VRAM.
